LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Enlist_Letter_Title: You have Enlisted into the {FACTION_name} military.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Enlist_Letter_Label:
this is a direct message from your commanding officer. It is a privelage, The {FACTION_name} Army. Be ready to make yourself available and report to any of our bases or cities to enhance your skills.

 You will be issued a standard salary every week for you and your troopers as well as provisions that can be picked up at our bases. The {FACTION_name} military has fine American bases in order to better facilitate your troops, use them wisely.

 A better American is worth fighting for!
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Enlist_Button_Desc: Sign a new contract with The {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Enlist_Requrements_Not_Satis: You need to have minimum of 10 goodwill, currently you have only {0} goodwill.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Menu_Missions_Desc: While leaving the HQ you ask around about any potential tasks that need doing.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Salary_Desc: You are entitled to collect wages from this faction every 14 days.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Provisions_Desc:
Provisions will given your caravan inventory the following every 10 days:

- 2 Enclave Food Crate 
- ×1 Enclave Medical Crate
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Provisions_Desc_Standard_Iss:
Enclave standard Issue gear will arrive via your caravan inventory every 30 days:

- ×1 Enclave Weapon Crate 
- ×1 Enclave Uniform Crate
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Storage_Desc: Store items from your caravan to your faction stash. Faction stashes transfer across all of the faction's outposts and will save contents even if you are no longer enlisted.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Hospital_Desc: Check in with the hospital of this base. This service tends to all of your troops with industrial medicine. Immunity gain is also increased while your troopers are in the hospital.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Intellectual_Training_Desc:
Train your troops with hourly experience gain on the following skills:

- Intellectual

Hourly experience gain stops when this faction is resting at night.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Shooting_Training_Desc:
Train your troops with hourly experience gain on the following skills:

- Shooting, Melee 

Hourly experience gain stops when this faction is resting at night.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Resign_Menu_Text: You will resign from active duty in the Enclave Military effective immediately. (-25 in relations)
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Resign_Button_Label: You have successfully resigned from active duty in the Enclave Military. (-25 relations)
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Resign_Button_Desc: Leave active duty from this faction.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Enlisted_To_Hostile_Faction: cannot join because you are enlisted with their enemy, {HOSTILEFACTION_name}
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Kick_Out_Label_Title: A direct order for your contract's immediate termination from service has been filed by {LEADER_nameDef}. You have been kicked out from the {FACTION_name} Military.
LanguageData.FCP_Enclave_Reinforcements_Button_Desc: Call for reinforcements from your faction. Amount of troops they send depends on your current relations.
